c74object.name: sy.length
c74object.description: Counts the number of Unicode codepoints in a symbol.

outlet.digest: Length of incoming symbol, or list of lengths of incoming symbols
outlet.description: The length is the number of Unicode codepoints in the symbol string.

method.name: anything
method.description: Returns the length of each symbol and outputs the result. The length of a symbol is, more specifically, the number of codepoints of its string, in Unicode representation.

method.name: bang
method.description: Returns the length of each symbol in the most recently received input list.

attribute.name: listin
maxdecimals
attribute.digest: Maximum Decimal Digits For Number Conversion
attribute.description: Sets the maximum number of decimals to be used for the conversion from number to symbol, in case the numbers attribute is set to "Convert To Symbol".

attribute.name: label
attribute.value: Maximum Decimal Digits For Number Conversion

attribute.name: nonstandard
attribute.description: Toggles the ability to count non-standard characters (e.g. combining marks, control codepoints, space modifiers, control codepoints, etc). Defaults to 0.

attribute.name: numin

entry.name: Outlet 1 (int/list)
entry.description: Length of incoming symbol, or list of lengths of incoming symbols. The length is the number of Unicode codepoints in the symbol string.
